isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - Meritor Medium Duty Front Drive Steer Axle - Assembly and Installation - Install Hub on Axle

step1.para: Install a new inner oil seal. Apply a layer of non-hardening sealing compound to the outside of the seal and install the seal into its correct position against the bore.

note.para: Do not force or hit the seal after it has touched the bottom of the bore. The seal can be damaged.

step1.para: On units equipped for ABS, install the ABS tone wheel on the hub with a suitable driver.

caution.para: Damage to the teeth on the ABS tone ring can create an error signal during testing and operation of the ABS system.

step1.para: Install the oil sleeve on the spindle with a driver.
Install the hub assembly onto the spindle. Be careful the oil seal is not damaged during installation. Press the hub until the inner bearing is flat against the face of the spindle.
Install the outer bearing cone on the spindle and push it into its cup inside the hub.
Install the inner wheel bearing nut, wheel bearing lock washer and outer wheel bearing adjusting nut (Figure 46).
